about.summary: 'SyncroSim' is a generalized framework for managing scenario-based datasets (<https://syncrosim.com/>). 'rsyncrosim' provides an interface to 'SyncroSim'. Simulation models can be added to 'SyncroSim' in order to transform these datasets, taking advantage of general features such as defining scenarios of model inputs, running Monte Carlo simulations, and summarizing model outputs. 'rsyncrosim' requires 'SyncroSim' 2.3.5 or higher (API documentation: <https://docs.syncrosim.com/>).

'SyncroSim' is a generalized framework for managing scenario-based datasets (<https://syncrosim.com/>). 'rsyncrosim' provides an interface to 'SyncroSim'. Simulation models can be added to 'SyncroSim' in order to transform these datasets, taking advantage of general features such as defining scenarios of model inputs, running Monte Carlo simulations, and summarizing model outputs. 'rsyncrosim' requires 'SyncroSim' 2.3.5 or higher (API documentation: <https://docs.syncrosim.com/>).

name: r-rsyncrosim
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.4.8' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rsyncrosim
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - https://github.com/syncrosim/rsyncrosim/releases/download/{{ version }}/rsyncrosim_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - https://github.com/syncrosim/rsyncrosim/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c4160e03bb512629c91ab0525a09dae6989bb6856fba52301fc10301826fe714

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}git
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-dbi
    - r-rsqlite
    - r-gtools
    - r-lifecycle
    - r-terra

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-dbi
    - r-rsqlite
    - r-gtools
    - r-lifecycle
    - r-terra

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('rsyncrosim')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('rsyncrosim')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: <https://syncrosim.github.io/rsyncrosim/>
  license: MIT
  summary: '''SyncroSim'' is a generalized framework for managing scenario-based datasets (<https://syncrosim.com/>).
    ''rsyncrosim'' provides an interface to ''SyncroSim''. Simulation models can be
    added to ''SyncroSim'' in order to transform these datasets, taking advantage of
    general features such as defining scenarios of model inputs, running Monte Carlo
    simulations, and summarizing model outputs. ''rsyncrosim'' requires ''SyncroSim''
    2.3.5 or higher (API documentation: <https://docs.syncrosim.com/>).'
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - katieb1

Simulation models can be added to 'SyncroSim' in order to transform these datasets, taking advantage of general features such as defining scenarios of model inputs, running Monte Carlo simulations, and summarizing model outputs. 'rsyncrosim' requires 'SyncroSim' 2.3.5 or higher (API documentation: <https://docs.syncrosim.com/>).
